title: ActInf GuestStream 060.1 ~ "Reflections and implications of a naïve attitude to architecture"
description:
Kristen Whittle
"Reflections and implications of a naïve attitude to architecture"
This proposed title is purposefully mischievous in that it derives from the SCHILLER/JUNGIAN sense of the word as it applies to ‘architect as nature’ and ‘communicating an intimate form of nature in architecture’. This would expand a conversation about the embedding of coherence (as it relates to free energy and active inference) into a sophisticated form of designed salutogenesis for architecture and cities and would enable me to encapsulate a number of thematics of past architectural projects I have designed including the new Australian Embassy in Washington DC.
